@StyLishSaLH 
I know you didn't, Sony did.
Cinavia is in movies distributed by Sony and only devices with the cinavia hardware can read the cinavia watermark and prevent playback of unauthorized movies (like PS3 firmware 3.10 or higher and some new Blu-ray players)
I think DVDFab can bypass the Cinavia.
